attributes.action: Suspend interest accruals on Student Loans.
attributes.additional_details: Instruct the Student Loan company to freeze interest accruals on Student Loans and rebate any interest that would have accrued from 1 April 2020. Interest should be suspended until at least April 2022
attributes.background: University Students have been hard hit by the pandemic. Their loans already attract a high rate of interest and the Government has done nothing to alleviate the short term and long term financial impact on students

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Exempt Uni students affected by Covid from being charged interest on loans.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559022

Reduce interest on ALL extant student loans to zero
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557047
